name: O Key Cupid
description:
O Key Cupid

Switch between two characters to solve puzzles that build the connection between them. 

Can you help connect these two characters who are destined to be together?

NOTE: Do not play with a console controller since it might break levels entirely!


Content Suited for All Ages

Controls:

ControllerMove
InteractSwitch CharacterPauseKeyboardWASD/ZQSD/Arrow KeysE/FSpace
Esc





Languages: 

 

Credits:

Install instructions

EN :

Windows: Extract the archive file (.zip) then open the extracted folder and run the file o-key-cupid-windows.exe .

Linux: Extract the archive file (.zip) then open the extracted folder and run o-key-cupid-linux.x86_64  . Windows version also works with Wine for Linux users.

Mac: Mark the file o_key_cupid_mac_osx.zip as trusted since it's not officially in the store and launch it.
developers: Point de Sauvegarde AKA Save Point
